long_description: Sized just for kids, the Edelrid Bandit Chalk Bag keeps your little one's hands dry while he or she works a challenging route indoors or out. Fleece-lined chalk bag is sized for kids' hands and will hold plenty of chalk (sold separately). Drawcord closure keeps chalk from spilling out while not in use. Elastic loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. The Edelrid Bandit Chalk Bag comes with a nylon webbing belt that adjusts easily.
short_description: Sized just for kids, the Edelrid Bandit Chalk Bag keeps your little one's hands dry while he or she works a challenging route indoors or out.
